wxPGPropertyWithChildren Class Reference

Base class for new properties that have sub-properties. For example, wxFontProperty and wxFlagsProperty descend from this class. More...

#include <propgrid.h>

Detailed Description

Base class for new properties that have sub-properties. For example, wxFontProperty and wxFlagsProperty descend from this class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

virtual void wxPGPropertyWithChildren::ChildChanged (  wxPGProperty *  p  )  [virtual]
 

Called after child property p has been altered.

The value of this parent property should now be updated accordingly.
